prompt.title: Get the list of Homeworks numbers
prompt.role: You are a Senior software engineer with extensive experience in Java software development
prompt.goal:
Return a JSON format with the list of Homeworks numbers. To achieve this goal, you need to:
Get access to the page https://www.cis.upenn.edu/~cis1940/spring13/lectures.html
to review the different Homeworks available and generate a JSON format with the following information which represents the numbers of the Homeworks:
```json { "List_Integer": [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 11, 12] } ```
Important: The JSON key MUST be "List_Integer" (exactly as shown). Only return the JSON format, nothing else and only return the first 4 Homeworks numbers.

output-format-list.output-format-item:
Replace in the following xml fragment the RESULT with the actual List of Homeworks numbers in JSON format in one single line
<result>RESULT</result>
Only return the JSON format, nothing else and only return the first 2 Homeworks numbers.

safeguards-list.safeguards-item: Not commit anything, just return the data
You could consider that the goal is achieved if you are able to print the list of Homeworks

acceptance-criteria-list.acceptance-criteria-item:
Return with
<result>RESULT</result>
where RESULT is the JSON with the list of Homeworks numbers in JSON format.
